test suite.name: RP
test suite.description: All the test available for this entity

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the iss claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the iss claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the sub claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the id claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the iat claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the iat claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the logo_uri claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the exp claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the exp claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the ref claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the ref claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the organization_type claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the organization_type claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the id_code claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id_code claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the email claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the email claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the organization_name claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the organization_name claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the entity configuration of a considered entity return a Federation Metadata in JOSE format when an HTTP GET request is made to its .well-known/openid-federation endpoint
test.description: The considered entity must have published its entity configuration in the .well-known/openid-federation endpoint. So in this test, an HTTP GET request is made to the entity's .well-known/openid-federation endpoint (appended to the URL which identifies the entity) and the response is analyzed. This response has to be the entity configuration of the entity and therefore a Federation Metadata in JOSE format (Content-Type: application/entity-statement+jwt)

test.name: Does the Entity expose the resolve entity statement endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the resolve entity statement endpoint, an HTTP GET request containing the parameters 'sub', 'anchor' and 'type' is made to the entity's endpoint and an HTTP 200 OK response containing the resolved metadata for the entity in the request's sub claim is expected.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter in the URL is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.

test.name: Does the RP correctly signed the JWT request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the request parameter in the URL is checked. It must be signed.

test.name: Does the token request is sent
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must be sent

test.name: Does the token request use HTTP POST
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must be sent in HTTP POST

test.name: Does the client_assertion in the token request contain a JWT
test.description: The client_assertion parameter in the token request sent by the RP must be a JWT

test.name: Does the RP contain a valid Access Token in the UserInfo request
test.description: The UserInfo request from the RP is taken and analyzed. In the Authorization field of the head there must be a valid Access Token

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the client_assertion as a valid JWT
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_assertion parameter is a signed JWT structure

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain correct type token
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the type of the token parameter is a JWT

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain correct type of client assertion
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_assertion parameter is a signed JWT structure

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain correct type of client_id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_id parameter is an HTTPS URL that identifies the RP

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain correct type of token for which the request is made
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the value of the token parameter is a JWT.

test.name: Does the RP use an asymmetric algorithm to sign the JWT in the request parameter of the Authentication Request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the alg parameter in the JWT Header is checked. If it corresponds to a symmetric algorithm or it is none, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain correct value for organization_type claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the organization_type claim can be 'public' or 'private'

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'client_id' parameter identifying the RP
test.description: In this test the request parameter of the Authentication Request is taken, the payload decrypted and the value of the 'client_id' parameter correspond to the one that can be found in the EC of the RP

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'redirect_uri' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'redirect_uri' parameter matches one of the URLs given in the RP metadata.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain a correct 'response_types' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'response_types' parameter is checked. This parameter's value must be the same of the 'response_types_supported' parameter in the OP metadata

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'iss' parameter set to the RP's client_id
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'iss' parameter has to be the client_id of the RP. If it is another value or is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'aud' parameter set to the Metadata OP's issuer
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'aud' parameter has to be the Metadata OP's issuer. If it is another value or is mauding, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the JWT payload contain a correct 'iss' claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking the iss claim. Its value must be an URL identifying the RP

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain incorrect 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is checked. It must not contain the value ['RSA_1_5'].

test.name: Does the metadata contain the organization_name claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the organization_name claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the homepage_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the homepage_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the policy_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the policy_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the contacts claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the contacts claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the federation_resolve_endpoint claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'redirect_uris' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'redirect_uris' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'grant_types' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'grant_types' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'jwks' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'jwks' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'signed_jwks_uri' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'signed_jwks_uri' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_enc' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_enc' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'token_endpoint_auth_method' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'token_endpoint_auth_method' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'client_id' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'client_id' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'client_registration_types' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'client_registration_types' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'response_types' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'response_types' parameter in the 'openid_relying_party' metadata type is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the iss parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the sub parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the sub parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the iat parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iat parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the exp parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the exp parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the jwks parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the jwks parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the metadata parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the metadata parameter is checked

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain the authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the authority_hints parameter is checked

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain the trust_marks parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the trust_marks parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP contain a correct JWT alg value
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the alg parameter in the request_url is checked.

test.name: Does the JWT header of the Authentication Request contain the kid parameter
test.description: In this test the request parameter of the Authentication Request is taken, and the presence of the 'kid' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP insert the client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP insert the client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the code_challenge parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP insert the client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the code_challenge_method parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'nonce' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'nonce' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'prompt' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'prompt' parameter is checked. If it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'redirect_uri' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'redirect_uri' parameter

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'response_type' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'response_type' parameter is checked

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request contain the 'scope' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'scope' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'acr_values' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'acr_values' parameter is checked. If it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request contain the 'claims' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'claims' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'state' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'state' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'exp' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'exp' parameter is checked. If it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'iat' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'iat' parameter is checked. If it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'iss' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'iss' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'aud' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'aud' parameter is checked. If it missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'ui_locales' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'ui_locales' parameter is checked. If it is missing, the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the JWT payload contain 'iss' claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the iss claim is present.

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain the sub claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the sub claim is present.

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain the aud claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the aud claim is present.

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain the iat claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the iat claim is present.

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain the exp claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the exp claim is present

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain the jti claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking if the jti claim is present.

test.name: Does the entity correctly sign the Entity Configuration
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken and the three parts of the JWT (header, payload and signature) are base64url decoded. Finally, the signature is validated passing the public key (n, e of jwks parameter that must be taken from the Entity Statement of a superior), the JWS Signature (received signature base64url decoded) and the JWS signing input (header and payload base64url encoded and concatenated with a dot dividing them) to a signature verifier configured for the algorithm described in the Entity Configuration Header

test.name: Does the RP correctly signed the JWT request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the request parameter in the URL is checked. It must be signed.

test.name: Does the client_assertion in the token request have a correct signature
test.description: The client_assertion parameter in the token request sent by the RP must be a JWT with a signature

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the client_assertion as a valid JWT
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_assertion parameter is a signed JWT structure

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain incorrect 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter is checked. It must not contain the values ['none', 'HS256', 'HS384', 'HS512'].

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain incorrect 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter is checked. It must not contain the values ['none', 'HS256', 'HS384', 'HS512'].

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain incorrect 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is checked. It must not contain the value ['RSA_1_5'].

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correctly signed trust_marks
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken. The three parts of the JWT (header, payload and signature) composing the trust marks are base64url decoded. Finally, the signature is validated passing the public key (n, e of jwks parameter), the JWS Signature (received signature base64url decoded) and the JWS signing input (header and payload base64url encoded and concatenated with a dot dividing them) to a signature verifier.

test.name: Does the RP checks that the state parameter in an authentication response is the same of the authentication request
test.description: In order to check if the RP correctly handles an authentication response, an incorrect response is sent and the behavior of the RP is analyzed. In particular, theflow should be interrupted if the value of the 'state' parameter in the Authentication response does not correspond to the one of the Authentication request.

test.name: Does the Entity expose the /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint, an HTTP GET request to the entity's endpoint is done and its entity configuration is expected as response.

test.name: Does the entity return a correct HTTP code in the EC response
test.description: In this test a correct request to the entity's /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint is made and the response is analyzed. It must be an HTTP 200 OK response

test.name: Does the Entity expose the resolve entity statement endpoint
test.description: In order to check the presence and correctness of the resolve entity statement endpoint, an HTTP GET request containing the parameters 'sub', 'anchor' and 'type' is made to the entity's endpoint and an HTTP 200 OK response containing the resolved metadata for the entity in the request's sub claim is expected.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct iss claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the iss claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct iss claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the iss claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the sub claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the sub claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the id claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the id claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id claim in it is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the correct iat type
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the iat claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain correct type of logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the logo_uri claim is a String.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain correct type of logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the logo_uri claim is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the exp type
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the exp claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain an URL in the ref claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the ref claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain an URL in the ref claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the ref claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the organization_type claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the organization_type claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain correcty type of id_code claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the id_code claim must be a JSON Object

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA for public organization contain the ipa_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a public entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id_code claim contains at least the value 'ipa_code'

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA for public organization contain the ipa_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a public entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the id_code claim contains at least the value 'ipa_code'

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA for public organization contain a correct type of 'ipa_code' claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a public entity must be taken, decrypted and the type of the value of the 'ipa_code' in the id_code claim is checked. It has to be a string

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA for public organization contain a correct type of 'ipa_code' claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a public entity must be taken, decrypted and the type of the value of the 'ipa_code' in the id_code claim is checked. It has to be a string

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA contain the aoo_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued by a SA must be taken, decrypted and verify the presence of the aoo_code claim in the id_code

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA contain the aoo_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued by a SA must be taken, decrypted and verify the presence of the aoo_code claim in the id_code

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA contain the uo_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued by an SA must be taken, decrypted and verify the presence of the uo_code claim in the id_code

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued by an SA contain the uo_code claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued by an SA must be taken, decrypted and verify the presence of the uo_code claim in the id_code

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued for private organization contain the fiscal_number or vat_number claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued for private organization contain the fiscal_number or vat_number claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued for private organization contain the fiscal_number or vat_number claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued for private organization contain the fiscal_number or vat_number claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.name: Does the id_code claim of a Trust Mark issued for private organization contain the fiscal_number or vat_number claim
test.description: In this test, a Trust Mark issued for a private entity must be taken, decrypted and the presence of the fiscal_number or vat_number claim in the id_code is checked

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the correct type of email claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the email claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the correct type of email claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the email claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain the correct type of organization_name claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the type of the organization_name claim in it is checked.

test.name: Does the token request contain a correct grant_type parameter
test.description: The grant_type parameter in the BODY of the token request sent by the RP must be set to authorization_code or to refresh_token. So in this test a token request is taken and the grant_type parameter is checked

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct value of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter in the URL is checked. It must Uniquely identifies RP

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct value of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the response_type parameter in the URL is checked. It must Uniquely identifies RP

test.name: Does the token request use application/x-form-urlencoded
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must be sent using application/x-form-urlencoded

test.name: Does the client_id in the token request identifies the RP
test.description: The client_id parameter in the BODY of the token request is taken. This parameter must identify the RP

test.name: Does the client_assertion_type parameter in the token request contain the correct type
test.description: The client_assertion_type parameter in the BODY of the token request sent by the RP must be set to urn:ietf:params:oauth:client-assertion-type:jwtbearer

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain correct type of client_assertion_type
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_assertion_type parameter is urn:ietf:params:oauth:clientassertion-type:jwt-bearer

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain correct client id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_id parameter identifies the RP

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain correct client_assertion_type
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_assertion_type parameter is urn:ietf:params:oauth:clientassertion-type:jwt-bearer

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain correct type of client_id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_id parameter is an URI that identifies the RP

test.name: Does the entity return a correct Content-Type in the EC response
test.description: In this test a correct request to the entity's /.well-known/openid-federation endpoint is made and the response is analyzed. It must have a Content-Type parameter set to application/entity-statement+jwt

test.name: Does the RP contain a correct JWT alg value
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the alg parameter in the request_url is checked. It must be between [ RS256, RS512, ES256, ES512, PS256, PS512].

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'prompt' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the 'prompt' parameter is checked. It must be set to the value 'consent' or 'consent login'. If it contains other values or it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request contain a correct value in 'scope' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'scope' parameter must be set to the value 'openid' then it can (optionally) have the values 'offline_access', 'profile' or 'email' appended.

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'openid_relying_party'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'openid_provider'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'federation_entity'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one 'oauth_authorization_server'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only one  'oauth_resource'
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types cannot be repeated and must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct iss parameter value
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked. It must identify the issuing entity.

test.name: Does entity configuration OP contain a correct sub parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the sub parameter is checked. Its value must be equal to the one in the iss parameter

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct value of 'client_id' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'client_id' parameter that uniquely identifies the RP

test.name: Does the Entity Statement's JWT payload contain a correct 'iss' claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the iss claim has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Entity Statement's JWT payload contain a correct 'iss' claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the iss claim has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Entity Statement's JWT payload contain a correct 'iss' claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the iss claim has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Entity Statement's JWT payload contain a correct 'iss' claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the value of the iss claim has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the sub claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the Trust Mark contain a correct sub claim
test.description: In this test, an issued Trust Mark must be taken, decrypted and the sub claim in it is checked. Its value has to be an URL

test.name: Does the JWT payload contain a correct sub claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking the sub claim. Its value must be the same of the iss value

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'id_token_signed_response_alg' parameter is ['RS256', 'RS512', 'ES256', 'ES512', 'PS256', 'PS512']

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'id_token_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is ['RSA-OAEP', 'RSA-OAEP-256', 'ECDH-ES', 'ECDH-ES+A128KW', 'ECDH-ES+A256KW']

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'id_token_encrypted_response_enc' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'id_token_encrypted_response_enc' parameter is ['A128CBC-HS256', 'A256CBC-HS512'].

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'userinfo_signed_response_alg' parameter is ['RS256', 'RS512', 'ES256', 'ES512', 'PS256', 'PS512']

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_alg' parameter is ['RSA-OAEP', 'RSA-OAEP-256', 'ECDH-ES', 'ECDH-ES+A128KW', 'ECDH-ES+A256KW']

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'userinfo_encrypted_response_enc' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the presence of the 'userinfo_encrypted_response_enc' parameter is ['A128CBC-HS256', 'A256CBC-HS512'].

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'token_endpoint_auth_method' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'token_endpoint_auth_method' parameter is 'one_of': 'private_key_jwt'

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct 'client_registration_types' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'client_registration_types' parameter is 'automatic'

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain in the 'response_types' the value 'code'
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the 'response_types' parameter in the 'openid_relying_party' contains the value 'code'

test.name: Does the RP insert the client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP insert the response type in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the response_type parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP insert the response type in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the scope parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the RP's Authentication Request contain the 'code_challenge' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken and the presence of the 'code_challenge' parameter is checked. If it is present, than the Authentication Request is using PKCE and is compliant with the specifications, otherwise it is not compliant.

test.name: Does the RP's Authentication Request contain the 'code_challenge_method' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken and the presence of the 'code_challenge_method' parameter is checked. If it is not present, then the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP insert the response type in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the request parameter in the URL is checked

test.name: Does the token request contain the client_id
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain client_id parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the token request contain the client_assertion
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain client_assertion parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the token request contain the client_assertion_type
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain client_assertion_type parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the token request contain the code parameter
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain code parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the token request contain the code_verifier parameter
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain code_verifier parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the token request contain the grant_type parameter
test.description: The token request sent by the RP must contain grant_type parameter in the BODY

test.name: Does the RP revoke the Token when the User logs out
test.description: In order to test if the RP really revokes an access token on logout, a classic authentication flow is computed and, once obtained the token and used, a logout is performed. After this, the requests made by the RP must be analyzed and there has to be a request to the OP's revocation endpoint for only the access token

test.name: Does the RP contain the Access Token in the UserInfo request
test.description: The UserInfo request from the RP is taken and analyzed. In the Authorization field of the header there must be an Access Token

test.name: Does the Introspection Request use HTTP POST
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP use HTTP POST

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the client_assertion
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_assertion parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the client_assertion_type
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_assertion_type parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the client id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain the token
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the token parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain the client assertion
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_assertion parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain the client_assertion_type
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_assertion_type parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain the client_id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the Revocation Request contain the token for which the request is made
test.description: The Revocation request made by the RP is taken and the presence of the token parameter is checked.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct iss parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked. It must be a Number.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct iss parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iss parameter is checked. It must be a Number.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct sub parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the sub parameter is checked. It must be a Number.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct sub parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the sub parameter is checked. It must be a Number.

test.name: Does entity configuration contain a correct iat parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the iat parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain a correct exp parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the exp parameter is checked

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct jwks parameter type
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the jwks parameter is checked. It must be JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains at least kty, which is a string

test.name: Does entity configuration contain the correct jwks parameter type for IT
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the presence of the jwks parameter is checked. It must contain at least KID.

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain a JSON Object
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object.

test.name: Does the metadata parameter contain only allowed types
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the interested entity is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the metadata parameter is analyzed. This must be a JSON object with each key representing a type of metadata. These types must be a value among the following: 'openid_relying_party', 'openid_provider', 'federation_entity', 'oauth_authorization_server', 'oauth_resource'

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain a correct authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the authority_hints parameter is checked, it must be an array

test.name: Does the OP's entity configuration contain a correct authority_hints parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration of the OP is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the authority_hints parameter is checked, it must be an array

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correct trust_marks parameter
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the type of the trust_marks parameter is checked. It must be an array

test.name: Does the entity configuration contain a correct trust_marks parameter value
test.description: To accomplish this test, the Entity configuration is taken, the payload is decoded (Base64 encoding) and the type of the trust_marks parameter is checked. It MUST contain id (string) AND trust_mark (JWT).

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct organization_name claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the organization_name claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be a String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct homepage_uri claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the homepage_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct policy_uri claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the policy_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It must be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain correct type logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the TA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the logo_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is a String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain a correct logo_uri claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the TA Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the logo_uri claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is an HTTPS URL with an .svg file

test.name: Does the metadata contain correct type contacts claim
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the value of the contacts claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is a JSON Array of String.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct federation_resolve_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an URL.

test.name: Does the metadata contain the correct federation_resolve_endpoint claim type
test.description: In this test the metadata in the Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_resolve_endpoint claim in the 'federation_entity' entity type is checked. It MUST be an HTTPS URL that ends with /trust_mark_status.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain at least federation_entity and openid_relying_party
test.description: In this test the RP metadata in the RP Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the federation_entity and openid_relying_party is checked

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain a correct 'redirect_uris' parameter type
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the type of the 'redirect_uris' parameter is checked. It must be a JSON Array of URL.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain a correct 'redirect_uris' parameter type
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the type of the 'redirect_uris' parameter is checked.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type grant_types claim
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the 'grant_types' parameter is a JSON array

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct grant_types claim
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'grant_types' parameter contains 'authorization_code' and 'refresh_token'

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the correct jwks claim type
test.description: In this test the RP metadata in the RP Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the jwks claim in the 'openid_relying_party' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains at least kty, which is a string

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the correct jwks claim type
test.description: In this test the RP metadata in the RP Entity Configuration are taken and the presence of the jwks claim in the 'RPenid_provider' entity type is checked. It must be a JSON Object that contains keys, which is a JSON Array, which contains kid, which is a string

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain a correct type of signed_jwks_uri claim
test.description: In this test the RP metadata in the RP Entity Configuration are taken and the type of the signed_jwks_uri claim in the 'openid_relying_party' entity type is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type id_token_signed_response_alg parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the id_token_signed_response_alg parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type id_token_encrypted_response_alg parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the id_token_encrypted_response_alg parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type id_token_encrypted_response_enc parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the id_token_encrypted_response_enc parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type userinfo_signed_response_alg parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the userinfo_signed_response_alg parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type userinfo_encrypted_response_alg parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the userinfo_encrypted_response_alg parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type userinfo_encrypted_response_enc parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the userinfo_encrypted_response_enc parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type token_endpoint_auth_method parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the token_endpoint_auth_method parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type of 'client_id' parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the value of the 'client_id' parameter is an HTTPS URL

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain correct type client_registration_types parameter
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the client_registration_types parameter in the 'openid_provider' subclaim (metadata type) is checked to be a JSON Array of strings.

test.name: Does the RP metadata contain the 'response_types' parameter as a json
test.description: In this test the RP metadata are taken and the 'response_types' parameter in the 'openid_relying_party' is a JSON array

test.name: Does the RP contain a correct JWT alg type
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the alg parameter in the request_url is checked. It must be a string

test.name: Does the RP contain a correct JWT kid type
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the kid parameter in the request_url is checked. It must be a string

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the client_id parameter in the URL is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the code_challenge parameter in the URL is checked. It must be a String.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of client ID in the url of the request
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the code_challenge_method parameter in the URL is checked. It must be a String

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'nonce' parameter is a string
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'nonce' parameter must be a string.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'nonce' parameter longer than 32 characters
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'nonce' parameter must be at least 32 alphanumeric characters long.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'prompt' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'prompt' parameter must be a string.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'redirect_uris' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'redirect_uris' parameter must be a URL.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'response_type' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'response_type' parameter must be a string.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'scope' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'scope' parameter must be a string.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct type of 'acr_values' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'acr_values' parameter is checked. If it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications. It should be a string separated by a space

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain a correct 'acr_values' parameter
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the presence of the 'acr_values' parameter is checked. If it is present, than it must be a string with the requested 'acr' values, each of them separated by a single space. The supported values are 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL1', 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL2' and 'https://www.spid.gov.it/SpidL3'. If it contains other values or it is missing, than the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'claims' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'claims' parameter must be a JSON Object.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'claims' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'claims' parameter must be a JSON Object.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the correct 'claims' parameter type
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'claims' parameter must be a JSON Object.

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'state' parameter is a string
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'state' parameter must be a string, then the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'state' parameter greater than 32 characters
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'state' parameter must be at least 32 alphanumeric characters long. If it is not present or its length is less than 32 alphanumeric characters, then the RP is not compliant with the specifications

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'exp' parameter is a Number
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'exp' parameter must be a Number

test.name: Does the RP Authentication Request's JWT contain the 'iat' parameter is a Number
test.description: The Authentication request is taken, the JWT Token in the request parameter base64url decoded and the value of the 'iat' parameter must be a Number

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of iss
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the iss parameter in the URL is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of aud
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the aud parameter in the URL is checked. It must be an HTTPS URL.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of ui_locales
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the ui_locales parameter is checked. It must be a String.

test.name: Does the RP insert the correct type of ui_locales
test.description: In this test the Authentication Request is taken and the presence of the ui_locales parameter in the URL is checked. It must be a string compliant with RFC5646 code with spaces.

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain a correct aud claim type
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking the aud. Its value must be an URL

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain a correct iat claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking the iat claim. Its value must be a timestap

test.name: Does the signed JWT assertion contain a correct exp claim
test.description: This test can be performed by taking the JWT present in the 'client_assertion' field of the RP's request, base64url decoding the payload and checking the exp claim. Its value must be a timestap

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain correct type of client id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_id parameter is an URI

test.name: Does the Introspection Request contain correct type of client id of the RP making the request
test.description: The Introspection request made by the RP is taken and the value of the client_id parameter is an URI

test.name: Does the client_id in the token request contain a String
test.description: The client_id parameter in the BODY of the token request is taken and checked to be a String

test.name: Does the client_id in the token request contain an HTTPS URL
test.description: The client_id parameter in the BODY of the token request is taken and checked to be an HTTPS URL
